titles: A declaration of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament Die Mercurii 10. May, 1643.
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
publisher: Printed for Iohn Wright in the Old-baily,
notes: Dated and signed at end: Die Martis 16. May; 1643. Ordered by the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament, that this declaration shall be forthwith printed and published. John Browne Cler. Parliamentorum.
A declaration of Parliament concerning the execution of an ordinance for taxing certain parishes in London.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Taxation --  Law and legislation --  England --  Early works to 1800.
Great Britain --  History --  Civil War, 1642-1649 --  Early works to 1800.
